Sindiswa Dlathu (a mụrụ na Jenụwarị 4, 1974) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eti egwu na South Africa. A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta Thandaza Mokoena na Muvhango, ọrụ ọ rụrụ site na mmalite nke ihe ngosi ahụ n'afọ 1997 ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2018.

Dlathu hapụrụ Muvhango ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na telenovela The River, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ Lindiwe Dlamini-Dikana, nwanyị na-eme ihe ike, onye ga-eme ihe ọ bụla iji chebe akụ na ụba ya ma nọgide na-ebi ndụ ya.
A họpụtara Dlathu dịka onye na-esote ya na Sarafina!
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, ya na Whoopi Goldberg rụkọtara ọrụ ma nye ya ọrụ dịka onye na-enyere Michael Peters aka
N'afọ 1988, ya na ndị nke abụọ nke Seipati Sothoane duziri bụ onye Sindi na-amụchaghị
Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gara njem, ọ nọrọ n'azụ wee mee Township fever n'afọ1989 na 1990 na-agagharị na US na egwuregwu ahụ ruo otu afọ.
Dlathu laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe afọ anọ nke ịnọ na ndị na-ese ihe nke Mbongeni Ngema
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1996, wee laghachi n'ime ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri nafọ 1997 ọ nọ na FNB Vita Award-winning Game, ebe ya na Mary Twala, Abigail Kubeka, na onye nwụrụ anwụ Nomhle Nkonyeni rụrụ ọrụ.
O meriri ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị amasị ya na 2020 DStv Mzansi Viewers' Choice Awards.
Dlathu, dịka Lindiwe Dlamini-Dikana si The River, pụtara na ihe omume crossover nke The Queen dịka enyi nke onye isi nwanyị, Harriet Khoza - Sebata.
N'afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite SAFTA na Best Actress category maka ọrụ ya nke Lindiwe na The River
